lore.text: 往く道を青く導き照らす
ダイヤモンド製のブーツ。

functions.tag: {ui:{smithable:1b,upgrade:[[{count:4,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/diamond_shards","custom_model_data":1015,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"ダイヤの欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"ダイヤモンドの小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"小柄ながらも高硬度を誇る。"}]']}},{count:1,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"diamond","custom_model_data":1016,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#7C7CE8","text":"ダイヤモンド"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"煌びやかなダイヤの原石。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"その輝きは人々を魅了する。"}]']}},{count:3,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/iron_shards","custom_model_data":1003,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"鉄の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"割れて飛び散った鉄の断片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"見た目以上に頑丈で重い。"}]']}}],[{count:6,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/diamond_shards","custom_model_data":1015,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"ダイヤの欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"ダイヤモンドの小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"小柄ながらも高硬度を誇る。"}]']}},{count:2,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"diamond","custom_model_data":1016,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#7C7CE8","text":"ダイヤモンド"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"煌びやかなダイヤの原石。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"その輝きは人々を魅了する。"}]']}},{count:5,Slot:14b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold_shards","custom_model_data":1006,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"金の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text
